data.eml:eml: A new sun moth species from the Flinders Ranges in South Australia (Lepidoptera, Castniidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kallies, Axel, Edwards, Ted (2018): A new sun moth species from the Flinders Ranges in South Australia (Lepidoptera, Castniidae). Zootaxa 4369 (2): 292-300, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4369.2.9
